value.ai_summary: RESTRunner is a comprehensive .NET 10 solution designed for automated REST API testing, performance benchmarking, and regression testing, with a focus on integrating Postman collections. The project provides a robust framework for executing API tests, offering features like performance analysis, load testing, detailed reporting, and a web interface for interactive testing, all built using modern .NET technologies and following high-performance, security-conscious design principles. Leveraging .NET 10's long-term support and performance optimizations, the project supports cross-platform testing with a strong emphasis on build speed, test execution efficiency, and package health, making it particularly valuable for developers and QA engineers seeking a comprehensive API testing and benchmarking tool. The solution includes a console application, web application, and sample CRUD API, demonstrating versatility in testing scenarios and providing multiple interaction modes for users. Notably, the project distinguishes itself through its performance metrics (19% faster builds, 25% faster tests), comprehensive test coverage (100% test pass rate), and a commitment to package optimization and security, targeting development teams looking for a reliable, high-performance API testing framework.
